verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Karibuni mezani
pake Bwana Yesu,
tukale chakula cha uzima. x2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Karibuni (karibu karibu)
Karibuni (karibu karibu)
tupate uzima wa milele.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mkristu mie niende
kwake Bwana Yesu,
nikale chakula cha uzima. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Alaye mwili wangu,
na kunywa damu yangu,
anao uzima wa milele. x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Karibuni mezani,
kwake Bwana yesu,
tukale chakula cha uzima. x2
